law.catch_line: The Commissioner shall include on each license:...

text.section:
The Commissioner shall include on each license:
The name of the licensee;
The address at which the business is to be conducted; and
The debt management services license number of the licensee.
A license authorizes the licensee to provide debt management services.
A license may not be transferred, assigned, or pledged.

section.section: If the licensee has an office in the State, the licensee shall prominently display the license in a location that is open to the public and at which the licensee engages in the business of providing debt management services.
If the licensee does not maintain an office in the State, the licensee shall maintain the license in the licensee's headquarters.
